产自南非的葫芦烟斗（Calabash），原理跟玉米芯烟斗差不多，都是用天然材料直接改造而成。还有我国的玉石、牛角等其他材料的 …
最后一种独立命名的弯斗，是葫芦式（Calabash）。其形状，直接取自用非洲葫芦的硬壳制作，并用海泡石做斗钵或内衬的真正葫芦 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French calebasse, from Spanish calabaza, perhaps from Persian ḵarbuz 'melon'

means.word_mean: 1. round gourd of the calabash tree
2. tropical American evergreen that produces large round gourds
3. Old World climbing plant with hard-shelled bottle-shaped gourds as fruits
4. bottle made from the dried shell of a bottle gourd
5. a pipe for smoking; has a curved stem and a large bowl made from a calabash gourd
